TITLE: AI-Prompt Dictionary
DEF: A curated resource of effective prompts for a defined educational context.
TASK: The AI-Prompt Dictionary is a pattern for curated collection of effective prompts in a specific educational context. The primary task of this pattern is to create and maintain resources to in leverage generative AI models effectively. This involves gathering, categorizing, and refining prompts based on the experience of learners and instructors regarding their effectiveness in the specific educational context. The challenge lies in continuously updating the dictionary with new and improved prompts as experience with the AI model grows and new AI resources come on line, while ensuring the dictionary can be effectively serached and the prompts reused.
